## Quiz: Gapminder Data
```{r}
age_of_marriage <- read.csv('Age_of_Marriage.csv', header = T, row.names = 1, check.names = F)

library(ggplot2)
```

## Summary
```{r}
summary(age_of_marriage)
```

## Histogram
```{r}
ggplot(data = age_of_marriage, aes(x = Age)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = .5) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(17, 33), breaks = seq(15, 35, 5)) +
  xlab('Age of First Marriage') +
  ylab('Number of Countries')
ggsave('ageHistogram.png')
```

## Frequency Plot
```{r}
ggplot(data = age_of_marriage, aes(x = Age)) +
  geom_freqpoly(binwidth = .1) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(17, 33), breaks = seq(15, 35, 5)) +
  xlab('Age of First Marriage') +
  ylab('Number of Countries')
ggsave('ageFrequency.png')
```
